glsa.title: MongoDB: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in MongoDB can lead to a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: MongoDB (from “humongous”) is a scalable, high-performance, open source, schema-free, document-oriented database.

description.p: MongoDB’s ‘mongod’ server fails to validate some cases of malformed BSON.

impact.p: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted BSON request possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All MongoDB users should upgrade to the latest version:
